title: (x) Beatles - probably hand-drawn, alternatives {Florian, Ton, Mike Y}
content:
Hello,

I'm interested in the font used for "THE BEATLES" and "HARD DAY'S NIGHT". I'm looking for this font or one similar to it. Sorry for the lo res file. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234038im_/http:/typophile.com/files/beatles_hard_days_night_5597.jpg)
author: homer808

comments.content: [Barbieri](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234038/http:/www.re-type.com/fonts/fonts-barbieri.html) has a similar overall feel, although the individual letterforms are not very close.
Much of the stuff in those days was hand-drawn, though based on the existing (Letraset) forms/typefaces. If you want to get the same result, well, follow the same rule.

The late Bob Alonso's [Animated Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020234038/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/animated-gothic/) is pretty similar, although maybe the baseline bounce is too much. I looked at his stuff right away, because he did a lot of commercial lettering work.

- Mike Yanega
